## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the coding standards of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debug code or console logs

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have added JavaDoc comments for new public APIs
- [ ] I have updated relevant README files

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have checked that new dependencies are necessary and appropriate
- [ ] New dependencies are compatible with the project's license (LGPL)
- [ ] I have updated dependency versions in pom.xml where needed
